# Warship Under Sail

Warship Under Sail: The USS Decatur in the Pacific West is a historical nonfiction work by Seattle author Lorraine McConaghy.  Based on archives of the United States Navy, it documents 's 1854â€“1859 Pacific Ocean cruises.  During this time Decatur played a part in the 1856 Battle of Seattle and William Walker's Nicaraguan filibuster.
